Every time I read something like this, I feel as if I lose a portion of my humanity. It actually forcefully re-enforces my belief that the entire human race needs to go extinct. It doesn't hurt me, it simply cools my head in a calm rage. It makes me think back to Charles Xavier's quote in First Class, when he tells Erik that he believes "true focus lies somewhere between rage and serenity". And that would aptly describe my feelings, or growing lack thereof.
Oh but I didn’t jerk off to this shit. There’s only so much I can take before the author makes me feel sympathy and mental frustration  for a depiction of a cuckold.

@Stop it, get some help I know that I’m a fucking hypocrite. I don’t like netorare, but you’d better bet that I’m still jerking off to it. I love reverse ntr or netori as some would say, because I don’t feel like an absolute piece of shit after busting a nut to it. No matter how much I dislike ntr, I’ll still reluctantly get off to it because no matter how much I say I dislike it, I don’t find it unacceptable to jerk off to.

This is a guess because I’m not and never will be a cuck, but cuckolds have got to be fucking masochists. They probably get off from the pain of watching someone they loved being fucked.
